title: Tech Village
short_details: This project is based on product resale. It has three user roles- Admin, Buyer and Seller. Different dashboard view for different user. Buyers can purchase products by stripe payment gateway.

title: Aero Visa Consultant
short_details: This project is based on visa and immigration consultant. User can add new services to it. User can leave review for a particular service.

title: Edu Tech
short_details: This project is based on IT courses. Sign in and registration authentication has been implemented. Only valid user can take premium access of courses. JWT has been implemented for authentication.
